local_intent: Ensure the brown object is visible, retry ApproachAndAlign up to 3 times, settle briefly, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Workspace clear to approach the brown object
Camera can see the object after scan
coherence_with_global: Implements perceive and approach stages consistent with GLOBAL_BT; includes retry for misalignment and a brief stabilization wait followed by visibility check. Push/retreat omitted as focus is the approach micro-goal.
